resources.string: Sign Up using your active subscription
Sign up for a free account

In order to sign up for a service, every new user must present a valid registration token.\n\nIf you found out about the app from a friend or from the posting online, you should be able to get a signup token from the same source.
Must be a currently valid and active address.\n\nDon\'t worry - we will only use this address for security and other alerts about your account. We don\'t send spam, and we don\'t sell your address.
We sent a 6-digit code to your email address to validate your account.\n\nEnter the code here to verify that this address belongs to you.

Your display name is how other users on the service will identify you.

The display name must consist of at least 8 characters, including at least two letters [a–z].

If you like, you can also use the numeric digits [0–9] and/or a few special characters like the dash, underscore, and period or "dot".
NOTE: Circle name and cover image are not encrypted
NOTE: Gallery name and cover image are not encrypted
Are you sure you want to log out?
Backup could not be decrypted with this passphrase.
Backup could not be decrypted with this recovery key.
Failed to get latest restore keys version.
Are you sure you want to leave this group?\n\nThis group is not public. You will not be able to rejoin without an invite.
You must select another member as an \"Admin\" to be able to leave this group.
Are you sure you want to cancel the invite for this user?
Are you sure you want to remove this user?
Are you sure you want to remove this user?\n\nUser still be able to join by invite.
Are you sure you want to ban this user?\n\nUser will not be able to join again.
Are you sure you want to unban this user?\n\nUser will be able to join again.
NOTE: Group name, topic and cover image are not encrypted
Are you sure you want to remove this post?
Are you sure you want to remove this image?
Ignoring this user will remove their messages from rooms you share.
Thank you for helping to keep this community safe and pleasant for everyone.\nThe following brief questions will help us to respond most effectively to your report.
How inappropriate is the reported content?
0: Very mild (fart jokes, toilet humor)\n100: Illegal content(child abuse; terrorism)
Which of the following categories does inappropriate message contain?
Demeaning or disparaging groups of people
Are you sure you want to remove this circle?
Are you sure you want to remove this group?
Are you sure you want to remove this gallery?
Remove from this circle, but do not unfollow
Select circles in which you want to follow this timeline

This will make your account permanently unusable. You will not be able to log in, and no one will be able to re-register the same user lD. This will cause your account to leave all rooms it is participating in, and it will remove your account details from your identity server. This action is irreversible.
In order to sign out from this session you should confirm your auth.
Confirm auth to enable cross signing
Voter see results as soon as they have voted
Result are only revealed when you end the poll
Result will be visible when the poll is ended
This will stop people from being able to vote and will display the final results of the poll.
Use your Recovery Passphrase or Recovery Key to continue.
Phf blocks must be bigger than %d
Phf iterations must be bigger than %d
This flavour does not support subscriptions
Log In flow for user not found
Scan QR code with one of your devices to finish verification
Seem like you denied %1$s permission previously. In order to use this feature please grant %2$s permission in settings.
Create your first Circle to be able to accept invite

Members only (since the point in time of selecting this option)
** Failed to send - please open room
Basic diagnostic is OK. If you still do not receive notifications, please submit a bug report to help us investigate.
One or more tests have failed, try suggested fix(es).
One or more tests have failed, please submit a bug report to help us investigate.
Notifications are enabled in the system settings.
Notifications are disabled in the system settings.\nPlease check system settings.
Circles needs the permission to show notifications.\nPlease grant the permission.
Notifications are enabled for your account.
Notifications are disabled for your account.\nPlease check account settings.
Notifications are enabled for this session.
Notifications are not enabled for this session.\nPlease check the Circles settings.
Notice that some messages type are set to be silent (will produce a notification with no sound).
Some notifications are disabled in your custom settings.
Google Play Services APK is available and up-to-date.
Circles uses Google Play Services to deliver push messages but it doesn’t seem to be configured correctly:\n%1$s

[%1$s]\nThis error is out of control of Circles and according to Google, this error indicates that the device has too many apps registered with FCM. The error only occurs in cases where there are extreme numbers of apps, so it should not affect the average user.

[%1$s]\nThis error is out of control of Circles. It can occur for several reasons. Maybe it will work if you retry later, you can also check that Google Play Service is not restricted in data usage in the system settings, or that your device clock is correct, or it can happen on custom ROM.
[%1$s]\nThis error is out of control of Circles. There is no Google account on the phone. Please open the account manager and add a Google account.
FCM token successfully registered to homeserver.
Failed to register FCM token to homeserver:\n%1$s
Failed to register endpoint token to homeserver:\n%1$s
The application is waiting for the PUSH
Failed to receive push. Solution could be to reinstall the application.
You are viewing the notification! Click me!
Please click on the notification. If you do not see the notification, please check the system settings.
Service will start when the device is restarted.
The service will not start when the device is restarted, you will not receive notifications until Circles has been opened once.
Background restrictions are disabled for Circles. This test should be run using mobile data (no WIFI).\n%1$s
Background restrictions are enabled for Circles.\nWork that the app tries to do will be aggressively restricted while it is in the background, and this could affect notifications.\n%1$s
Circles is not affected by Battery Optimization.

If a user leaves a device unplugged and stationary for a period of time, with the screen off, the device enters Doze mode. This prevents apps from accessing the network and defers their jobs, syncs, and standard alarms.
No other method than Google Play Service found.
No other method than background synchronization found.
No valid Google Play Services APK found. Notifications may not work properly.
